{"id":533371655,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1628108510,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/533371655/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int s_len = s.length(); int p_len = p.length();\n        int p_idx = 0; int s_idx = 0; int star_idx = -1; int match;\n        while(s_idx < s_len) {\n            if (p_idx < p_len && (p[p_idx] == '?' || s[s_idx] == p[p_idx])) {\n                ++p_idx;\n                ++s_idx;\n            } else if (p_idx < p_len && p[p_idx] == '*') {\n                star_idx = ++p_idx;\n                match = s_idx;\n            } else if (star_idx == -1) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                p_idx = star_idx;\n                s_idx = ++match;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        for (int i = p_idx; i < p_len; ++i) {\n            if (p[i] != '*') return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching"}
